text: Gold Coins is a 2017 Malayalam feature film written and directed by Pramod G Gopal, and starring Dr Amar Ramachandran, Master Vasudev, Master Gopal, Sunny Wayne, Meera Nandan, and Tessa Joseph in the lead role. The film is a Neni Entertainments production and was released on 9 June 2017. ==Cast== * Dr Amar Ramachandran * Master Vasudev * Master Gopal * Sunny Wayne * Meera Nandan * Tessa Joseph * Saikumar * Hemanth Menon * Anil P Nedumangad * Raja Sahib * Joy Mathew * Saju Navodaya * Master Adish Praveen * Jelbi Anna Augustine * Baby Neha Amar ==References== == External links == * Category:2010s Malayalam- language films Category:Indian films
title: Gold Coins (film)
